title: If a man teases me or calls me names in public, can I lodge a complaint?
content:
Yes!
It is wrong and mentioned specifically in Section 249 of the Indian Penal Code (IPC). You can file an FIR with the police, but make sure you take as many details as possible to serve as evidence. You can also file a report if a man sings an obscene song, ballad or utters any abusive words.
